api_list.api_description: Retrieve all images of a specific breed.

required_parameters.name: breed
required_parameters.description: The breed of dog images to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Compresses an image by sending the file using the POST method.

required_parameters.name: file_path
required_parameters.description: The local file path of the image to be compressed.

optional_parameters.name: qlty
optional_parameters.description: The quality level for JPG compression (0-100).

query: I would like to see all images of a dog breed and then compress one of them using a compression service. Could you handle this task?
